abstract.para: The last step in configuring the &admserv; is starting &crow;.

chapter.para: Before starting the &inst_crow; to finish the configuration of the &admserv;, make sure to double-check the following items.

listitem.para: Make sure the network configuration is correct. Run &yast; &crow; to review/change the configuration. See for further instructions.

important.title: An &haSetup; Requires Team Network Mode
important.para: If you are planning to make &cloud; highly available, whether upon the initial setup or later, set up the network in the team mode. Such a setup requires at least two network cards for each node.

listitem.para: Make sure hostname -f returns a fully qualified host name. See for further instructions.
Make sure all update and product repositories are available. See for further instructions.
Make sure the operating system and &productname; are up-to-date and have the latest patches installed. Run zypper patch to install them.

To use the &wi; for the &inst_crow; you need network access to the &admserv; via a second network interface. As the network will be reconfigured during the &inst_crow;, make sure to either have a bastion network or an external gateway configured. (For details on bastion networks, see .)

chapter.para: Now everything is in place to finally set up &crow; and install the &admserv;. &crow; requires a PostgreSQL database—you can either create one on the &admserv; or use an existing PostgreSQL database on a remote server.

procedure.title: Setting up &crow; with a Remote PostgreSQL Database

step.para: Make sure a user account that can be used for the &crow; database exists on the remote PostgreSQL database. If not, create such an account.
Test the database connection using the credentials from the previous step:
You need to be able to successfully connect to the database before you can proceed. Run crowbarctl database help test for help and more information.
To connect to the database, use the following command:
Run crowbarctl database help connect for help and more information.
